name: Juan Jose Polanco Arias
bio: Telematics Engineer, lover of software development, artificial intelligence, technology development, research and entrepreneurship. Outside of technology, I'm a Crossfiter, a fan of professional wrestling (AEW, WWE, NJPW, AAA), motorsports (Formula 1, WEC, Formula E), an anime fan (my favorite Yugioh including the card game) and the hiking/abseiling I like traveling and discovering new places, mountain and adventure tourism and doing crossfit.
